positive_examples: This is an example of acetic acid.
The acetic acid demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed acetic acid in this context.
A typical case of acetic acid would involve these features.
The concept of acetic acid applies here.
A weak organic acid that is the main component of vinegar and widely used in chemical synthesis.
negative_examples: This is an example of sulfuric acid, not acetic acid.
This represents chemical acid in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: SulfuricAcid, or other types of ChemicalAcid

definition: A weak organic acid (CH3COOH) that gives vinegar its sour taste.
